Also note that even with this stack trace, I haven't noticed any abnormal behavior (at least on this Eclipse session).

Willian: I'm offline most of today but we need to quickly figure out if there is a showstopper here.  Can you reproduce?  Could you try to upgrade another workspace and make sure that you're using the same VM?

Oh and yes, this error has not caused failures in the past.  If you do see anything suspicious or have any other steps please post.  It would also be helpful if you could do the following:
* Export your Task Data (just in case)
* Disable 1.0.0
* Reinstall 1.0.0
* Report if you get any similar stack traces.
Just one more note on this: we had no major changes to this part of the code for a few versions, and no changes at all sincoe 0.9.2.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 167784 ***
